channel.title: I need help with windows vista
channel.description:
Ive just brought my new pc home and set up ect.
Ive downloaded the new jdk update (3 i think it was ) .
I can compile with no errors, but when i run i get this -
[CODE] :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: :: :: Davescape server help :: :: :: :: :: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
To goto messenger type m
To backup your server type bac
To compile your server type c
To run your server type r
To run and compile your server type car
To goto file writer type w
To create a command type cmd
To ping a server type p
To kill java processes type k
To exit type e
For extra options type ex
Option:r Running Server - Please Wait ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: / \ / \ / Now starting server... \ / \ / \ ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/CODE]
Also .. people cant connect to my server .. i need to edit a "path" or something dont i? .. someone help plz.
Thanks

item.title: I need help with windows vista
item.dc:creator: @bonghead bonghead
item.description:
@bonghead wrote:

Thanks mate,

If i could rep i would… but im a nub :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2008, 03:31:44 PM[/size][hr]Ive got that sorted now. I can compile/run ect.

BUT…

Only i can play the server… people cant connect :S.

Ive just bought/installed zone alarms… anyone know anything that goes wrong with ZA and servers?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with windows vista

item.title: I need help with windows vista
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

in the tutorial section one of the stickies is how to set up a server. if you scroll down it will tell you how to set them (its on windows xp but vista should be the same)

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with windows vista
item.dc:creator: @bonghead bonghead
item.description:
@bonghead wrote:

[quote=“xx nub xx, post:2, topic:170211”][quote author=bonghead link=topic=230071.msg1971643#msg1971643 date=1199325750]
Ive just brought my new pc home and set up ect.

Ive downloaded the new jdk update (3 i think it was ) .

I can compile with no errors, but when i run i get this -

[CODE] ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
:: ::
:: Davescape server help ::
:: ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

To goto messenger type m

To backup your server type bac

To compile your server type c

To run your server type r

To run and compile your server type car

To goto file writer type w

To create a command type cmd

To ping a server type p

To kill java processes type k

To exit type e

For extra options type ex

Option:r
Running Server - Please Wait
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
/
/
/ Now starting server…
/
/
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . . [CODE]

I dont think its zone alarm but hey … what do i know :|[/code][/code]
[/quote]

that means you didn’t set environmental variables for JDK 1.6.03 :o[/quote]

Any idea where i can get a tut for doing that?

Read full topic
